name: 0PS7Masked
description: Pixel sorting effect applied only within the segmentation mask, with options for sorting thresholds, direction, and visual adjustments.

paramDescriptions.threshold_min: Minimum pixel brightness for sorting. Pixels below this brightness are ignored in the sorting process.
paramDescriptions.threshold_max: Maximum pixel brightness for sorting. Pixels above this brightness are ignored in the sorting process.
paramDescriptions.angle: Angle to apply to the frame before pixel sorting.
paramDescriptions.contrast: Adjusts the contrast of the image.
paramDescriptions.saturation: Adjusts the saturation of the image.
paramDescriptions.resolution: Resolution level for processing (lower values increase speed but reduce quality).
paramDescriptions.noise_amount: Percentage of noise added to the effect.
paramDescriptions.noise_scale: Scale of the noise pattern applied to the image.
paramDescriptions.sorting_direction: 0 for vertical sorting, 1 for horizontal sorting.
paramDescriptions.sorting_style: 0 for sorting by Hue, 1 for sorting by Saturation, 2 for sorting by Lightness.
